name: Pilxie
description: Like the Plasma Element it represents, the pudgy Plixie's cranium contains a viscous ooze that floats and sways hypnotically within its container. While the joy of revival has made this buzzy Celestial a bit of a party Monster, its head's passing resemblance to a lava lamp should be disregarded. But please - if its Plixie Glass cap falls off while headbopping to its favorite tune, help scoop the goop!
